title: WTB: T207s to complete a subset?
author: frohme

posts.post_title: WTB: T207s to complete a subset?
posts.post_content:
OK, this is yet another longshot, but looking for a few T207's to complete a couple of goals:

[URL="https://imageevent.com/gspinf/t207brownbackground/napoleonichalloffamers"]The Napoleonic HOF'ers[/URL].  T207 HOFer's with Napoleon back - 10 down, 3 to go.  Need Carey, Tinker, and Wheat 

The Broadleaf-class Pirates.
As part of trying to put a master team set of Pirates together, Pittsburgh in tougher Broadleaf class cards are easier than the Recruit class. Need Alex McCarthy - Anonymous, Factory 25
 
For these cards any grade will do ... just looking to land 'em at some point.

If you've got one you'd care to part with, or can point me at one, I'd be obliged, and/or make it worth your while.

Thank you for looking.
--
Mike Frohme
502/712-0742
[url]mikefrohme@yahoo.com[/url]
